data.expected_result: : Edit bar disappears and text is not copied to the send message section
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a DM to somebody - click on edit messages - (Do not press "done") - press the navigation button and go to another server - send something in the server - go back to the person who you DM - Realise that the text you sent earlier (you pressed edit but didn't edit) was copied to the Send message bar
